title: LAP Podcast: Environmental Violence in Mexico: A Conceptual Introduction
description: Tomas Ocampo, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews Nemer E. Narchi, editor of the September 2015 Issue: "Environmental Violence in Mexico: A Conceptual Introduction."
